2fa-info: Two Factor Authentication is enabled for this account. Please enter the one-time password from your authenticator app.
forgot-password-info: Enter your e-mail address. We will send you an email to reset your password.
reset-password-info: Enter the code we've sent to your e-mail address and the new password you want to use.
password-recovery-email-sent: We have sent you an e-mail to reset your password. Please click the link in that e-mail to change your password.
password-reseted: Password reseted. Please login using your new password.
disable-2fa-prompt: Are you sure you want to deactivate 2FA?
2fa-scan-info: Please scan the following QR Code using your authenticator app.
2fa-enter-otp-info: Then enter the one-time password (OTP) generated by your authenticator app.
2fa-recovery-codes-info-1: You can use these one-time recovery codes if you cannot use your authenticator app.
2fa-recovery-codes-info-2: These codes will only be shown this time.
2fa-recovery-codes-info-3: Print a copy of your backup codes and store them somewhere safe.
2fa-close-prompt: These codes will not be displayed anymore. Please make sure you have stored them. Continue?
2fa-backup-info: Enter one of your backup codes.
activation-error: Cannot activate the account. Please check the link is correct.
recovery-link-error: Cannot continue with the password reset process. Please check the link is correct.
confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
confirm-delete-group: Are you sure you want to delete this group?
confirm-delete-role: Are you sure you want to delete this role?
